items.name: Havelock Island: Exotic Island
items.section_excerpt: There really is nowhere quite like Havelock Island. Exotic beach resorts allow you complete privacy and plenty of water adventures. There are both easy and moderately difficult adventures that honeymoon couples in Havelock can enjoy. Sunsets and sunrises are particularly beautiful here, making it one of the best honeymoon places in Andaman.

items.name: Little Andaman: Exquisite Retreat
items.section_excerpt: 120 km from Port Blair, Little Andaman is a soothing retreat located at the southern tip of Andaman. The beach has plenty of attractions for honeymooners that include wonderful nature views made up of waterfalls, creeks, rain forests, and stunning white beaches. Little Andaman is truly charming and a place with a bounty of surprises.

items.name: Ross Island: Historical Remains
items.section_excerpt: Ross Island is known for being a historically significant tourist destination which was set up as a penal colony by the British to punish those who participated in the 1857 rebellion. The island has since then become a historically significant destination that attracts thousands of tourists who come to pay homage to those who shed blood to fight for freedom.

items.name: Great Nicobar Island: Exotic Destination
items.section_excerpt: One of the largest islands in the Andaman and Nicobar, Great Nicobar Island is a place that is host to a marvelous natural ecosystem. The island is open only for Indian, and offers an exotic settings to honeymooners. Indira Point is one of the best places to visit on this island. You should also visit the Great Nicobar Biosphere Reserve on your trip to Andaman honeymoon places.

items.name: Kaala Pathar Beach: Cozy Moments

Spend your time amidst the stunning blue waters and spend a day out with your loved ones. There are plenty of picnic spots where you can layout your lavish spread, the beach is also surrounded by eateries.

The island is rich in biodiversity and also observes some volcanic activities. Witness some breathtaking basalt formations and enjoy the solitude in this remote island with your better half on your honeymoon trip to Andaman.

items.name: New Wandoor Beach: Experience Nirvana
items.section_excerpt: New wandoor Beach is one of the best Andaman honeymoon places. The beach, located nearby to Mahatma Gandhi National Park, is one of the cleanest beaches in Andaman. This beach is commonly used as a mode of transfer between Jolly Buoy and Red Skin Islands, which is why it is not crowded. You can take long walks on the beach and calm yourself in the serene environment that this beach offers. This is…
items.description: New wandoor Beach is one of the best Andaman honeymoon places. The beach, located nearby to Mahatma Gandhi National Park, is one of the cleanest beaches in Andaman. This beach is commonly used as a mode of transfer between Jolly Buoy and Red Skin Islands, which is why it is not crowded. You can take long walks on the beach and calm yourself in the serene environment that this beach offers. This is one of the most amazing places to visit in Andaman for honeymoon.

For newly weds, this is definitely amongst the most picturesque places to…

Although there are no water or adventure activities here, this beach is ideal if you are looking to spend some quality time with your partner.

items.name: Sitapur Beach: A Sunrise Spot
items.section_excerpt: Another one of the most amazing honeymoon places in Andaman is the Sitapur Beach in Neil Island. This beach has romance written all over it. This beach is also named as the ‘sunrise beach' of Andaman for the obvious reason. Hence, make sure you visit the spot early in the morning to come across the best blend of various hues of pinks, yellows, and blues that look right out of a fairytale. The crow…
items.description: Another one of the most amazing honeymoon places in Andaman is the Sitapur Beach in Neil Island. This beach has romance written all over it. This beach is also named as the ‘sunrise beach' of Andaman for the obvious reason. Hence, make sure you visit the spot early in the morning to come across the best blend of various hues of pinks, yellows, and blues that look right out of a fairytale. The crowds are also less during these hours, hence it happens to be the perfect escape for the couples.

items.name: Mini Zoo: Witness Crocodile Farming

Mini Zoo gives you and your partner a chance to witness the magnificence of mother nature in the form of some exotic species of animals. Although, there is not much of a variety, however, there are some extremely interesting and offbeat spots that you cannot find anywhere else. items.name: Cellular Jail: A Colonial Affair
items.section_excerpt: Sitting in Port Blair, cellular jail might not be something that shouts romance, but if you are a couple who has a thing for history and architectural beauty, you should definitely pay this attraction a visit. Cellular Jail is integral to the Indian Freedom Struggle as it this place witnessed the manifold prosecutions that freedom fighters were subjected to. The history of this place never fails t…
items.description: Sitting in Port Blair, cellular jail might not be something that shouts romance, but if you are a couple who has a thing for history and architectural beauty, you should definitely pay this attraction a visit. Cellular Jail is integral to the Indian Freedom Struggle as it this place witnessed the manifold prosecutions that freedom fighters were subjected to. The history of this place never fails to impress the travelers. You can also watch a light and sound show that takes place here during the evenings.
query_hints: Cellular Jail: A Colonial Affair
Cellular Jail: A Colonial Affair Andaman and Nicobar Islands

items.name: Chidiya Tapu: Witness The Wild
items.section_excerpt: Chidiya Tapu is among the popular choices for those visiting Andaman on a honeymoon. This tourist destination is sitting on the southernmost tip of South Andaman and boasts about being home to several wonders of mother nature. The sunsets, the ocean spread as far as the eye can see, and the extensive number of bird species that can be found here is truly incredible. You can also find crocodiles he…
items.description: Chidiya Tapu is among the popular choices for those visiting Andaman on a honeymoon. This tourist destination is sitting on the southernmost tip of South Andaman and boasts about being home to several wonders of mother nature. The sunsets, the ocean spread as far as the eye can see, and the extensive number of bird species that can be found here is truly incredible. You can also find crocodiles here, hence you need to be a little aware about the surroundings. It is a must-visit!
query_hints: Chidiya Tapu: Witness The Wild
Chidiya Tapu: Witness The Wild Andaman and Nicobar Islands

items.name: Mahatma Gandhi Marine National Park: Exquisite Coral Reefs
items.section_title: Mahatma Gandhi Marine National Park: Exquisite Coral Reefs
items.section_excerpt: Another spot that is thoroughly enjoyed by wildlife and nature lovers is the Mahatma Gandhi Marine National Park. This National Park is sitting away from the buzzing streets of the city and is one of the most surreal spots that you can visit in Andaman. Mahatma Gandhi National Park is home to around 15 exquisite islands that exhibit the stunning underwater life and is definitely a thrill to experi…
items.description: Another spot that is thoroughly enjoyed by wildlife and nature lovers is the Mahatma Gandhi Marine National Park. This National Park is sitting away from the buzzing streets of the city and is one of the most surreal spots that you can visit in Andaman. Mahatma Gandhi National Park is home to around 15 exquisite islands that exhibit the stunning underwater life and is definitely a thrill to experience such beauty around. The park is spread over 281 sq kilometers and encompasses some stunning coral reefs, mangrove creels, and rainforests.
query_hints: Mahatma Gandhi Marine National Park: Exquisite Coral Reefs
Mahatma Gandhi Marine National Park: Exquisite Coral Reefs Andaman and Nicobar Islands

items.name: Joggers Park: Romance Amidst Nature
items.section_excerpt: This is one of the highest points that you can find in the city of Port Blair. Joggers Park is a spot for those couples that wish to spend some time in the arms of mother nature. You can witness the lush greens and just enjoy the refreshing aura that the park has to offer. The park has a lit runway at night that is as alluring as it can get. It is a place to unwind, enjoy a little workout together…
items.description: This is one of the highest points that you can find in the city of Port Blair. Joggers Park is a spot for those couples that wish to spend some time in the arms of mother nature. You can witness the lush greens and just enjoy the refreshing aura that the park has to offer. The park has a lit runway at night that is as alluring as it can get. It is a place to unwind, enjoy a little workout together, or simply take a stroll and talk about the life that awaits!
